sentences.sentence: The same goes for unfreed memory.
sentences.translation: 对于没有释放的内存也一样。

sentences.sentence: MEMWATCH supports ANSI c, provides a log of the results, and detects double-frees, erroneous frees, unfreed memory, overflow and underflow, and so on.
sentences.translation: MEMWATCH支持ANSI C，它提供结果日志纪录，能检测双重释放(double - free)、错误释放(erroneous free)、没有释放的内存(unfreed memory)、溢出和下溢等等。
